about_the_game:
"Lucky Hero": A Fantasy Adventure Weaving Wisdom, Exploration, and Strategy! Welcome to the world of "Lucky Hero"! This is a game that perfectly combines roguelike adventures with strategy. Together we'll engage in battles with a variety of enemies using the wheel of fortune, unlock and combine various symbols and character skills!
In this unique game, traditional weapons and equipment have evolved into symbols within the Wheel of Fortune. Tactfully combine these symbols to battle powerful enemies from different regions.
The game offers a rich symbol library and unique character skills, along with three different professions providing endless strategic possibilities for your battles. In this process, a well-thought-out strategy and a bit of luck are essential.
In this challenging world full of strategies, only by thoroughly studying various enemies and symbol combinations can you become the true Lucky Hero!
